name: Discover Consultancy
slogan: We offer specialized consulting for a wide range of industries
description: We provide specialized consulting for your personal and professional needs. Here to give you unbiased advice, answer all your questions and help you achieve your goals!

team.name: Melissa Yacoub
team.bioHtml: Founder of Discover Consultancy, I also find pleasure career coaching individuals who want to create a passion-driven professional path.

jobs.title: Inbound & Outbound Sales
jobs.description:
Discover Consultancy is looking for an energetic, driven and ambitious business developer & salesperson that thrives in a startup environment. We want someone excited to help individuals grow and prosper through training and consulting! The compensation is commission-based and you can work in your own time and, of course, remotely too! 

Responsibilities include:

 - Identifying leads in our target industries to build robust customer prospect lists, generating leads through research and connections 
- Reach out to 15-30 prospects each day, prioritizing those who best match our customer profile 
- Maintaining diligent records in a CRM 
- Achieving and outperforming quarterly goals 
- Retaining and expanding existing accounts (monthly retainer clients) 
- Executing a Sales Plan that incorporates: sales strategies and identification of high potential markets, new business development strategy and existing account penetration plans. 
- Developing and fulfilling individual sales plans that outline monthly revenue objectives by the distinct services and weekly activity objectives. 
- Negotiating contracts with new clients as well as maintaining relationships with key contacts in large accounts. 
- Providing accurate sales forecast to establish annual budgets and to plan for additional resources needed to achieve corporate goals.
